message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to make sure it's a good deal for me as well.
